Reviews.Title: great camera awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Big Mike
Reviews.Content: I am really glad I found this deal as I was about to push the button on a sony 65 package and then found Focus's dealcouldnt find anything comperable within $500. they even sent me a better memory card then depicted. Also del was 4 days early!  Thanx FocusThis is an update about the rest of the package deal from FocusThe tripod was insufficient to say the least It could not hold the camera weight, along with the camera bag which wasnt even a "camera" bag but one for a small camcorder.I sent both back paid over $15 for shipping and filed with Amazon about my problemthey (FOCUS) sent me another "bag which again is not big enough for the sony A77V that I ordered and even though they sent me back a Zeiko full size tripod valued by Focus at $9.95 (REALLY?), I still feel it will not be sufficient to handle the size and weight of the camera I boughtAlso in communication with Focus, The missing remote control from my first delivery, I was told was ready to ship and as of this date still no remote!I am not going to send back the bag and tripod this time because shipping for the 2nd time will amount to over $30 for the two timesBUT I AM HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED IN FOCUS FOR THE WAY THEY FOLLOWED UP ON THIS PROBLEM!I'M STILL WAITING FOR THE REMOTE CONTROLAT THIS POINT I CHOSE TO CHANGE MY RATING OF THIS SELLER

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Malissa Garcia
Reviews.Content: Love love love this camera. Only complaint is that the bag is not big enough to hold camera and lens.

Reviews.Title: Just received my Sony, Love this camera already and the bundle came just as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Kervin James
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera to shoot my son's sporting events (baseball and basketball) and for family vacations (ski trip in a few weeks) and I completed extensive research comparing the Canon, Nikon and Sony product line-ups and all of the reviews led me to believe that this A77 was the best camera for my money.  I purchased a 50mm f/1.8 lens for daily use and a large back pack (the one that comes with the bundle is definitely too small therefore I will use it with my point and shoot camera only).  This camera takes amazing photos!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice DSLR
Reviews.Author: Tammie Taylor
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the performance of this camera, clear shots, easy to use if you are somewhat familiar with a DSLR. Has many options for your personal style of photography. The only draw back I see is that when you go to adjust the diopter for your vision sometimes you hit the record button that is beside of it which can be a little frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: Great camera w/ alot of accessories..very good bundled deal..bag is a little small but I didnt intend on using it for the a77 anyway

Reviews.Title: Good deal!
Reviews.Author: Victor Peralta
Reviews.Content: I ordered this kit and everything arrived on time and in perfect conditions. The tripod seemed resistant enough and did not shake. The Remote control, charger and memory card are all original from Sony.

Reviews.Title: This package is a very good deal
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The package arrived after onl Wednesday, after orderi Sunday night I was very pleased with that. Upon arrival, I noticed that the camera and lens were NOT factory sealed and appeared to have been previously opened. All other items in this package were brand new with the seals still intact. I've purchased sony alpha cameras before and am familiar with the way they are sealed and this one clearly had been unboxed for some reason earlier in its existence. Functionally: the camera  and lens are flawless, I was able to shoot excellent stills with little adjustment in no time. The tripod in my opinion is great for smaller cameras but not for the A77, being that it's a fairly large camera. My satisfaction is met but only due to the camera being in perfect physical and operating condition, I am however still a little unsettled with the two main items appearing to be for some reason factory unsealed.  The savings through this offer is substantial, that being said if your looking to get a lot of extras that are useful (nice lens, nice memory card, remote, extra battery and charger) spend the extra 100 bucks. If you just want to upgrade to the a77,  just buy the body alone.
